rows.label: tlk400907_msg0001
rows.name: The green barrels... There they are!

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0002
rows.name: Hey, there are yellow barrels too.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0004
rows.name:
These must be materials
for an artificial Blade.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0005
rows.name:
Now we just need to find out
where they're being taken.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0007
rows.name:
There's a memo written
in Nopon here, mo.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0008
rows.name:
But... The handwriting is so
messy I can't read it, mo...

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0009
rows.name: It looks like a baby's scribbles, mo...

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0010
rows.name:
If you two can't read it...
It must be pretty bad...

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0011
rows.name:
Our only option is to have
someone decipher it.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0012
rows.name:
That's one idea, but what about
keeping watch on these barrels?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0013
rows.name:
But we don't know when someone
will come to pick them up, do we?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0014
rows.name: What if it's in five days?

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0015
rows.name:
This is the perfect time to rely
on the mercenaries' strength.

rows.label: tlk400907_msg0016
rows.name: That's certainly one way to do it...
